data.author: Kamala Harris
data.content: My mother had a saying: 'Kamala, you may be the first to do many things, but make sure you're not the last.'

data.author: Kamala Harris
data.content: My mother had a saying: 'Kamala, you may be the first to do many things, but make sure you're not the last.'

data.author: Kamala Harris
data.content: We don't have to let extremists define us.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.content: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.content: Consistency is the last refuge of the unimaginative.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.content: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.content: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.content: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.

data.author: Sun Tzu
data.content: Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories.

data.author: Sun Tzu
data.content: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.
